info.name: Aternos Customizer
info.description: Aternos is the world's largest free Minecraft hosting provider. Give it a fresh coat of paint inspired by your own unique taste. You can deck out all the colors, backgrounds, fonts and more just by clicking the gear box! Backgrounds photographed by me.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0.4 (August 7th, 2024)
- Fixed log errors display

v1.0.3 (August 7th, 2024)
- Fixed text editor display
- Fixed adblock warning display

v1.0.2 (August 7th, 2024)
- Fixed color of status console

v1.0.1 (August 6th, 2024)
- Renamed to Aternos Customizer
- Added extensive customization options

v1.0 (August 5th, 2024)
- Initial commit

settings.label: Background Color (Website background color, takes effect only when Aternos is set to dark theme.)
Sidebar Color (Left and top areas of site.)
Section Color (Color of Aternos modules/parts of dashboard.)
Hide Help Articles (Makes your custom background more visible.)
NOTE: You can choose Light/Dark theme using the sun icon in the bottom left of the Aternos website.
NOTE: To change customization options, you must trash the theme first, then re-install it.
UI Facelift (Enables the new UI design.)

options.label: Yes
